lead_paragraph: Kenny Perry beat Brad Adamonis and Jay Williamson in a one-hole playoff to win the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill. Perry escaped with his third victory in five starts despite bogeying the 18th hole. Perry had a one-stroke lead at 17 under par through 17 holes. While Adamonis and Williamson hit approach shots into the pond during the playoff at No. 18, Perry’s stopped just short of the hole. He tapped in from about 16 inches for par and the victory.
